A dataset outlining various region definitions

Source: R/region_isos.R
region_isos.Rd

This dataset maps codes representing countries to regions.

For information about the ISO standard for country codes see https://www.iso.org/iso-3166-country-codes.html.

region_isos

Format

An object of class tbl_df (inherits from tbl, data.frame) with 3722 rows and 3 columns.

Definitions

  • isos (character): Countries in region, defined by iso code.

  • region (character): Benchmark region name.

  • source (character): Source publication from which the regions are defined.

See also

data_dictionary

Other iso codes: iso_codes, region_isos_demo

Examples

head(region_isos)

#> # A tibble: 6 × 3
#>   region             isos  source  
#>   <chr>              <chr> <chr>   
#> 1 advanced economies bg    weo_2019
#> 2 advanced economies hr    weo_2019
#> 3 advanced economies cy    weo_2019
#> 4 advanced economies mt    weo_2019
#> 5 advanced economies ro    weo_2019
#> 6 advanced economies au    weo_2019
